backend/main.mo: Motoko canister handling daily messages, streak tracking, profile management, and access-controlled actions like uploading music.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping specific frontend files to streak-celebration and check‑in logic requirements.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of main frontend components, hooks, pages, and config files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining extensive OKLCH color variables and theming for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that mounts the React app and loads main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up QueryClientProvider and ThemeProvider and renders MainPage with toast notifications.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Login/logout button integrating Internet Identity with loading states, error handling, and cache clearing.
Mood check‑in UI that triggers streak updates and shows celebratory toasts when the streak increases.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupDial: Modal allowing new users to enter and save their name with validation and feedback.
frontend/src/components/StreakCard.tsx: Displays the user’s streak with different UI states for unauthenticated, loading, error, and loaded cases.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user’s identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, handling login, logout, identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for daily message, streak info, mood check-ins, and user profile interactions via the actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind and custom OKLCH-based theme variables and utility classes for styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/music/tracks.ts: Empty placeholder file for music track data.
frontend/src/pages/MainPage.tsx: Main UI page showing daily message, login, streak, mood check‑in, and profile setup with animated layout and error handling.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read, store, and clear URL and sessionStorage parameters, including support for hash-based routing and persisted parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, animations, container settings, and plugins for the frontend UI.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, existing features, and pending feature requests for the habit/mood tracking app.
